title: Makkila
address: Calle de Serrano (main), also Núñez de Balboa 75, Fernando VI 2
description: Traditional Spanish restaurant with international influences. Large terrace and two interior areas (high tables/bar for quick bites, dining room for leisurely meals). Specialties include caramelized onion omelette, roast beef, squid in onion, and meatball kebab. Better known for drinks and atmosphere than food. Multiple locations.
